marklogic.body: Yes the high octane offense that was 12th in the NCAA last year, KU 106th. 14 Spots from the bottom of the barrel, where the defense resided at #120. Â Mizzou sports have been consistantly good, where KU's focus is on basketball which is where it should be with the great history there. Â Missouri NEVER went 0-9 in Big 12 football. For basketball the worst conference record in last 10 years was 5-11 in '05-06. Â Consistency equals respect, that's why the SEC wanted MIZZOU. Blow Off KU, if you think you have a better overall athletic program.
